# Welcome!

My name is Allen Hoskins, and I am employed as a Senior Health Care Analyst/Data Engineer with Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Alabama. In 2015, I earned a BS in Information Systems Management from Auburn University and in 2018 obtained my M.B.A. from the University of Alabama at Birmingham's Collat School of Business. Currently pursuing a Master of Science in Data Science from Southern Methodist University with an anticipated graduation of 2023. I'm a world traveler who loves to expand my horizons and learn to appreciate other cultures.
